me.andrew28.addons.conquer.api

Class ConquerPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.andrew28.addons.conquer.api.ConquerPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PowerHolder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FOPlayer, FUPlayer, LFPlayer, MSPlayer, SFPlayer

    public abstract class ConquerPlayer
extends Object
implements PowerHolder
    An offline or online player that may or may not be in a ConquerFaction
